name: StandardizedAssessmentToolsForFatigueRelatedToChronicIllness
title: Standardized Assessment Tools for Fatigue Related to Chronic Illness
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set captures concepts related to assessment tools used to classify fatigue in patients with chronic illnesses.),(Data Element Scope: Standardized assessment tools.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes the PROMIS and FACIT tools.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes PROMIS and FACIT tools that are not designed to classify fatigue in chronic illness.)
